content.raw: I have fixed the problem where the agent spawns in the center of the field with Pull request #54. The agent falling is probably due to different physics in Gazebo and the fact that the robot is not sending joint velocity information. To change things to be more like Simspark you would need to increase the model's joint stiffness parameters.
